topic.title: Number Of Patients Transported Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: The number of patients transported by this EMS crew and unit

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.31"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11136)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10665)/@code="67547-0" Patients transported in EMS unit [#] NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10664)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10666)
NEMSIS Trace: eDisposition.11
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11136)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10665)/@code="67547-0" Patients transported in EMS unit [#] NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10664)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10666)
NEMSIS Trace: eDisposition.11
